oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Whole Farm Analysis: The Future of Herd Health Programs
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Bell, Robert
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Data collection
data analysis
agricultural software
historical analysis
management technique
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Data collection and historical data analysis has dominated agricultural software in the past. However, the future lies in utilizing on-farm data and historical analysis to accurately predict the future. This approach allows producers the opportunity to model and predict the impact of a proposed management technique prior to its implementation.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1997; 58-60
